Description: A viral infection that attacks the respiratory system.

Description: A blockage of blood flow to the heart muscle.

Description: A headache of varying intensity, often accompanied by nausea and sensitivity to light.
Solution: Pain relief medications and avoiding triggers.

Description: A bacterial infection that causes pain and inflammation in the throat.
A chronic inflammatory bowel disease that affects the lining of the digestive tract.
Inflammation of one or more joints, causing pain and stiffness.
Solution: Medications, physical therapy, and sometimes surgery.

Description: A condition that makes your skin red and itchy.
A group of diseases that result in too much sugar in the blood.
Solution: Lifestyle changes, medications, and monitoring blood sugar levels.

Description: A condition in which the thyroid gland doesn't produce enough thyroid hormone.

Symptoms: dry cough, shortness of breath, chest pain
Description: An infection that inflames the air sacs in one or both lungs.
A mosquito-borne viral infection causing severe flu-like symptoms.

Symptoms: muscle weakness, trouble swallowing, drooping eyelids
Description: A neuromuscular disease that leads to varying degrees of skeletal muscle weakness.
Chest pain caused by reduced blood flow to the heart muscles.
An inflammation of the liver.

Symptoms: frequent headaches, difficulty concentrating, memory loss
Description: A mass or growth of abnormal cells in the brain.
A mosquito-borne infectious disease affecting humans and other animals.

Symptoms: persistent cough, coughing up blood, weight loss
Description: An infectious disease that mainly affects the lungs.

Symptoms: high blood pressure, headache, blurred vision
Description: A condition in which the force of the blood against the artery walls is too high.

Symptoms: chest tightness, wheezing, shortness of breath
Description: A condition in which your airways narrow and swell and may produce extra mucus.

Description: A cancer of the lymphatic system.

Symptoms: extreme fatigue, pale skin, shortness of breath
Description: A condition in which you lack enough healthy red blood cells to carry adequate oxygen to your tissues.

Description: An infection in any part of the urinary system.
Solution: Antibiotics and drinking plenty of water.

Description: A highly infectious respiratory disease caused by the coronavirus.
Inflammation of the gums.
Solution: Good oral hygiene and professional dental cleaning.

Description: An infection of the urethra.
Solution: Antibiotics and drinking plenty of water.

Description: A fungal infection typically on the skin or mucous membranes.

Description: A condition in which the skin and the whites of the eyes turn yellow.
